alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the City of Franklin and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 930 PM EDT... At 841 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hunterdale, or over Franklin, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Franklin around 845 PM EDT. Sedley around 850 PM EDT. Holland and Carrsville around 900 PM EDT. Zuni around 915 PM EDT. Windsor around 920 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Whitley, Collosse, Lees Mill, Handsom, Lummis, Riverdale, Kilby, Walters, Boaz and Burdette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
